WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Hi,

It could be helpful to know that, as of Prism v2 and v4, this is no longer the behavior of the SingleActiveRegion.

Thank you for your feedback.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
WorkItem.Description: Having a ContentControl in a view (for example replacing the ItemsControl with ContentControl in the hello world application which is much more appropriate), one should call Activate on the SingleActiveRegion region created.
